original: Bergendal, Seved William, med. dr, lasarettsläkare, Kalmar, f. 29/5/98 i Lund av prof. David B. o. Nanny Erikson. G. 27 m. Elisabeth Nordström. Barn: Harald f. 29, Gunnar 30, Eva 32, Göran 38, Karin 44. — Stud:ex. v. h. a. 1. i Lund 16, med. kand. 20, med. lic. 25, med. dr 37, allt i Lund. E. o. aman. v. anat. inst. i Lund 19, aman. sju mån. 23, aman. v. med.-kem. inst. i Lund 20, v. kvinno-klin. i Lund fjorton mån. 23-27, v. kir. klin. där 27-28, andre und :läk. där 29-30, förste und :läk. 31-34, assist :läk. o. tf. aman. v. öronklin., med. klin. o. röntgeninst. i Lund 35-36, förste und:-läk. v. Hälsingb. las.. kir. avd. 36-38, tillika bitr. las :läk. v. ’samma avd. 37-38, las :läk. i Flen 38, v. kir. avd. v. centr :’l;as. i Kalm. 46. Doc. i kir. v. Lunds univ. 37-38. Skr.: ett dussintal skr. i gynekol. o. företr :vis kir., bl. a.: Zur Frage der Hydronephrose bei Nierengefässvarianten (dr:avh. 36).
translated: Bergendal, Seved William, MD, hospital physician, Kalmar, b. May 29th, 1898 in Lund to Professor David B. and Nanny Erikson. Married in 1927 to Elisabeth Nordström. Children: Harald b. 1929, Gunnar b. 1930, Eva b. 1932, Göran b. 1938, Karin b. 1944. Education: high school graduate from Lund in 1916, Bachelor of Medicine in 1920, licentiate of medicine in 1925, doctor of medicine in 1937, all from Lund University. Work experience: assistant at the anatomy institute in Lund in 1919, assistant for seven months in 1923, assistant at the medical-chemical institute in Lund in 1920, assistant at the women's clinic in Lund for fourteen months from 1923-1927, assistant at the surgical clinic there from 1927-1928, second assistant physician from 1929-1930, first assistant physician from 1931-1934, assistant physician and acting assistant at the ear clinic, medical clinic, and radiology institute in Lund from 1935-1936, first assistant physician at the surgical department of the Hälsingborg hospital from 1936-1938, also acting assistant doctor in the same department in 1937-1938, hospital physician in Flen in 1938, surgical department of the central hospital in Kalmar in 1946. Docent in surgery at Lund University from 1937-1938. Written works: a dozen articles in gynecology and surgery, including "On the question of hydronephrosis in renal vascular variations" (doctoral dissertation in 1936).

hasWritten.headline: On the question of hydronephrosis in renal vascular variations
